title: Friday-Night Tuna Salad
introduction: This Friday-Night Tuna Salad is a simple yet flavorful dish that brings together the classic ingredients found in many Italian homes. On meatless Fridays, this easy salad makes for a refreshing and satisfying dinner, featuring tuna, crisp vegetables, and perfectly hard-cooked eggs.
ingredients: 1 (7-ounce) can Italian tuna packed in olive oil
2 ribs celery with leaves, trimmed and sliced
2 medium tomatoes, cut into bite-size pieces
3 or 4 slices red onion, thinly sliced and quartered
1/2 of a medium head of romaine lettuce, rinsed and dried
instructions: 1. Place the tuna with its oil in a large bowl. Break the tuna into pieces with a fork.
2. Add the celery, tomatoes, eggs, and onion to the tuna. Sprinkle with the oregano and olive oil and toss lightly.
3. Arrange the lettuce leaves on a platter. Top with the tuna salad. Garnish with lemon wedges and serve immediately.
